channel.title: Soulsplit is getting shut down
channel.description:
This should finally end all the rumours about Jagex doing business with Soulsplit: [url=http://community.soulplay.co/community/index.php?threads/all-our-private-servers-ss-alotic-sspawn-are-shutting-down-on-july-first.13553/]http://community.soulplay.co/community/index.php?threads/all-our-private-servers-ss-alotic-sspawn-are-shutting-down-on-july-first.13553/[/url]
I think this is the final blow for RSPS in general. Ikov has already been taken down before so who knows if it will happen again. The rest of the servers are pretty much irrelevant. There really is no point wasting your precious time on a game which will eventually get shut down.

item.dc:creator: @my-swagger my-swagger
item.description:
@my-swagger wrote:

Loveandpower:

So how is Pam taking this?

Pretty well, he’s got enough funds to support his new project + a lot of “loyal” ss players are bound to give his game a kick starter with a player base.

They never had an agreement with Jagex in the first place, some fudgeing retard started that rumor years ago but you can lookup court cases that jagex LTD is involved in and find the one dealing with this particular server Interestingly enough Jagex didn’t teabag them quite is hard as they did with the Snellman brothers
[/quote]how did that turn out, btw?

they got wrecked[/quote]rip ibot

item.title: Soulsplit is getting shut down
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

[b]This site is no longer available to the public, as it is not authorized to publish Jagex content.

The unauthorized reproduction and distribution of copyright work is against the law, and in most countries a criminal offence, punishable by imprisonment and substantial fines.

If you are looking for a traditional runescape experience, an official server hosting 2007 content can be found [/b]

Yep, they were taken down by Jagex.

Read full topic

item.title: Soulsplit is getting shut down
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Davidi2:

They never said it was related to jagex shutting them down, so they could still have been doing that. In fact if it was I think they would have jumped at the opportunity to say it was jagex rather than saying “we cant tell you what happened”. Looking at the replies in the thread it seems like this was a long time coming because their staff was killing the game and they were losing playercount even before this. Can’t say I’ll be sad to see them go.

I don’t think they are legally aloud to say to the public if Jagex did shut them down. But the fact the domain will now redirect to OSRS is a big indication that this may have been the case. The same thing happened with Ikov. If you go on Ikov.org, that also will redirect you to OSRS.

Read full topic

This should finally end all the rumours about Jagex doing business with Soulsplit:
http://community.soulplay.co/community/index.php?threads/all-our-private-servers-ss-alotic-sspawn-are-shutting-down-on-july-first.13553/

I think this is the final blow for RSPS in general. Ikov has already been taken down before so who knows if it will happen again. The rest of the servers are pretty much irrelevant. There really is no point wasting your precious time on a game which will eventually get shut down.
